title: Crime Scene Investigation 2: Dark Motives
description:
Crime Scene Investigation 2: Dark Motives       


INSTALL NOTES:
       ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1) Mount with Daemon Tools or Alcohol 120% 
      
2) Install the game - full install

3) Move the crack from the Azzi777 folder on CD3 into the CSI2Code subdir overwriting original file, 
   just click YES when you run the game and nag screen appears.

4) PLAY!



First uploaded by Azzi777
